name: Idle Garden
description:
If game display a black square, Please reload the page.About

Cookie-Clicker-like Idle game. 

You can click the button on the left to grow the plant in the screen.

If the plant is fully grown, it's automatically harvested and you obtain the money depend on the size of the plant.

You can purchase Items by clicking the buttons on the left , to accelerate plant`s grow speed.     

The harvested plant drops a seed, and the seed  will start growing. The end of life is also a beggining!
